unnormalised: ## Lights, Camera, Festival! Your Guide to the Film Fest Circuit (and why you should care!)
normalised: ## Lights, Camera, Festival! Your Guide to the Film Fest Circuit (and why you should care!)

unnormalised: Hey Bollywood buffs and cinephiles! Ever feel like just watching movies on Netflix isn't enough? Want that *extra* dose of cinematic magic? Then it's time to dive into the world of film festivals!
normalised: Hey Bollywood buffs and cinephiles! Ever feel like just watching movies on Netflix isn't enough? Want that *extra* dose of cinematic magic? Then it's time to dive into the world of film festivals!

unnormalised: Think of film fests like this: it's like attending a crazy, awesome wedding reception, but instead of relatives you mildly dislike, you're surrounded by movies you've probably never heard of, directors you'll be fangirling over in 5 years, and enough samosas to feed a small army (well, depending on which festival you're at!).
normalised: Think of film fests like this: it's like attending a crazy, awesome wedding reception, but instead of relatives you mildly dislike, you're surrounded by movies you've probably never heard of, directors you'll be fangirling over in five years, and enough samosas to feed a small army (well, depending on which festival you're at!).

unnormalised: Seriously though, film festivals are *the* place to discover hidden gems, see groundbreaking documentaries, and connect with fellow film lovers. From the biggies like the International Film Festival of India (IFFI) in Goa, held every year in November, to smaller, more specialized fests popping up all over the country, there's something for everyone. I remember attending the Kolkata International Film Festival back in 2018, and it was a total eye-opener. Saw this amazing Bengali short film, and honestly, it was better than half the stuff I saw in the multiplex that year!

unnormalised: * **Discover new talent:** Forget the usual Khans. Film fests are brimming with fresh faces and innovative filmmakers.
normalised: * **Discover new talent:** Forget the usual Khans. Film fests are brimming with fresh faces and innovative filmmakers.

unnormalised: * **See movies you won't find anywhere else:** Think independent films, documentaries, and foreign language flicks that never make it to PVR.
normalised: * **See movies you won't find anywhere else:** Think independent films, documentaries, and foreign language flicks that never make it to P V R.

unnormalised: * **Meet interesting people:** Network with industry professionals, filmmakers, and fellow movie enthusiasts. Trust me, the post-screening discussions are almost as good as the films themselves!
normalised: * **Meet interesting people:** Network with industry professionals, filmmakers, and fellow movie enthusiasts. Trust me, the post-screening discussions are almost as good as the films themselves!

unnormalised: * **Experience different cultures:** Many festivals showcase films from all over the world, offering a glimpse into different cultures and perspectives.
normalised: * **Experience different cultures:** Many festivals showcase films from all over the world, offering a glimpse into different cultures and perspectives.
